summary: To attain a responsible position in an organization of repute where I can utilize my accounting expertise to prepare fair and accurate financial documents for the organization.

experience.title: Finance Manager
experience.description: Responsible for budgeting and forecasting, IRR & NPV calculations, treasury management, debtors management, finalisation of accounts for Northern region, MIS reporting, asset depreciation, bank guarantees and letters of credit; supervised the finance team.

experience.title: Senior Finance Executive
experience.description: Budgeting & forecasting, critical point analysis; IRR & NPV for project valuation; treasury tools (fund flow, cash flow and working capital analysis); debtors management (region wise); finalisation of accounts (Northern region); dealer and employee commissions; audit scheduling; MIS reporting; asset register maintenance; depreciation calculations; government liaison and banking activities.

experience.title: Branch Finance Manager
experience.description: Finalisation of accounts (branch), customer dealings; debt management and aging analysis; branch operating expenses controlling; revenue recognition; budgeting; MIS reporting; asset register maintenance; credit controlling; overall branch finance operations.

experience.title: Finance Executive
experience.company: DIC India Limited (Erstwhile Coates of India Limited)
experience.description: All debtors management (region wise); finalisation of accounts (Eastern region); budgetary control and critical point analysis; fund flow, cash flow & working capital statement analysis; MIS reporting; raising short-term bank loans; government liaison; bank guarantees; export documentation; tax-related issues; creditors' bills processing; service tax, central excise, PF, ESI, etc.

experience.title: Finance Officer
experience.description: Finalisation of accounts; debtors and creditors management; cash flow statement; central sales tax and VAT returns; tax compliance; provident fund; ESI; bank guarantees; letters of credit; BRS.
